trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Liverpool
There were no other sightings in Liverpool on or around July 23rd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI WENT TO THE BACK DOOR WHICH WAS OPEN WHEN I LOOKED OUT TO THE WEST AND THERE WERE 3 ROUND ORANGE OBJECTS FLYING IN FORMATION ONE AFTER THE OTHER.THEY WERE FLYING ACROSS THE SKY HEADING NORTH BUT NOT GOING FAST AT A GUESS LESS THAN A 100M.P.H. I CALLED MY WIFE OUT AND SHE OBSERVED THEM TOO.THERE WAS NO SOUND EMITTED FROM THEM.SUDDENLY THEY VEERED TO THE WEST AND DISAPPEARED INTO CLOUD AND WITHIN SECONDS A PLANE APPEARED COMING IN THE OPPOSITE DIRECTION GETTING READY TO LAND AT JOHN LENNON AIRPORT, THE PILOT OF THE PLANE MUST HAVE SURELY SEEN THEM.I DID NOT SEE THE OBJECTS AGAIN.
